/usr/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/facerec_lbph.dir/samples/facerec_lbph.cpp.o  -o facerec_lbph -rdynamic libopencv_facerec.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_core.so.2.4.8 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.8 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.8 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.8 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_core.so.2.4.8
